issues.description: Unclear TODO about properties field: 'Is this legal to set if $path is set?' This suggests a design decision or constraint that should be documented in JSDoc or code comments with proper context.
TODO to implement an internment strategy for RojoRefs. This suggests potential memory usage optimization opportunity where identical RojoRef values could be deduplicated.
TODO: 'Add a better way to tell if the root of a project is a directory'. Current implementation relies on heuristics that may not be reliable.
TODO: 'provide replacement snapshots for e.g. two way sync'. Feature gap for bidirectional synchronization support.
TODO: 'Implement a way to use inheritance for this'. Suggests incomplete implementation of inheritance-based functionality.
TODO: 'make this more granular'. Metadata writing is currently all-or-nothing for project nodes, which is not always desirable. Should be made more intelligent about selective metadata application.
TODO: 'Add method to allow selectively applying parts of metadata'. Currently lacks granular control for metadata application.
Error handling gap: Comment notes 'TODO: Turn into error type' suggesting proper error handling should be implemented instead of current approach.
TODO: 'sort this better'. CSV sorting logic exists but is not optimal.
TODO: 'Is it worth this being an Arc or Rc?' Questions memory management strategy that should be evaluated.
TODO: 'Introduce a strict mode where $ignoreUnknownInstances is never'. Feature request to add strict validation mode for projects.
TODO: 'handle meta.json files in this branch'. Missing implementation for metadata file handling in certain code paths.
TODO: 'Support user defined init paths'. Feature gap for customizable initialization paths.
TODO: 'Is this even necessary anymore?' Questions whether certain code is still needed, suggesting potential dead code.
TODO: 'We shouldn''t need to know about Lua existing in this'. Module has unnecessary coupling to Lua.
TODO: 'Introduce machinery to detect conflicts, like keeping previous + current values in all fields'. Missing conflict detection mechanism in applied patch sets.
TODO: 'Store previous values in order to detect application conflicts'. Applied patch updates lack previous value tracking for conflict detection.
UGLY HACK: Workaround for rbx-dom pivot migration issue (github.com/rojo-rbx/rojo/issues/628). Hard-coded list of Model-derived classes. Not future-proof - needs upstream fix or better abstraction.
UGLY HACK: Identical pivot migration workaround as patch_compute.rs. Duplicated hack affecting both snapshot insertion and patch computation. Both locations must be kept in sync.
TODO: Contextless TODO comment. No explanation of what needs to be implemented when instance has no instigating source.
TODO: 'Use this for bidirectional sync or requesting fallbacks'. Comment suggests unimplemented feature for API enhancement.
TODO: 'Transform from UstrMap<String, Option<_>> to something else, since null will get lost when decoding from JSON in some languages'. Data type choice issue affecting cross-language compatibility.
TODO: 'Can we cleanly use the socket for all communication?' Architectural question about communication patterns.
TODO: 'Can we cleanly use the socket for all communication?' Architectural question about communication patterns (duplicate concern).
TODO: 'Change this to be a SmallVec for performance in common cases?' Performance optimization suggestion for metadata handling.
TODO: 'Work out what we should expose publicly'. Public API design decisions need to be finalized.
TODO: 'Should we do this in multiple requests so we can more granularly mark failures?' Request serialization approach not optimized for granular error handling.
TODO: 'Why would this happen?' Unexpected condition in instance map lookup that lacks explanation.
TODO: 'Generate ID for our instance and add it to inversePatch.added'. Missing implementation for inverse patch tracking.
TODO: 'When changing between instances that have similar sets of'. Incomplete TODO comment explaining patch application logic.
TODO: 'If this fails part way through, should we move everything'. Error recovery strategy undefined for partial operations.
TODO: 'Can this fail? Some kinds of instance may not appreciate'. Unvalidated operation that may fail silently.
TODO: 'Support changing metadata. This will become necessary when'. Incomplete metadata support in patch application.
TODO: 'Can this fail? Previous versions of Rojo guarded against this, but'. Potential error condition that may be inadequately handled.
FIXME test: 'should ignore unreadable properties'. Test is disabled (itFIXME), indicating known issue with unreadable property handling.
TODO: 'Track ancestry to catch when stuff moves?' Incomplete ancestry tracking for move detection.
TODO: 'Maybe add visualizations to other datatypes?' Feature gap in patch visualization UI.
TODO: 'Figure out a better way to serialize infinity and NaN'. Current serialization approach for special float values is suboptimal.
FIXME: 'More robust handling of enums'. Enum encoding/decoding lacks robustness.
TODO: 'Add a test for NaN or Infinity values and envelopes'. Special float values not covered by tests.

TODO: Path normalization is incomplete and not robust. Relies on Rojo to prepend CWD. Cannot properly canonicalize paths without full context. Example: '/Users/../../other/file.txt' -> '/other/file.txt' (incorrect). Should implement proper path normalization or add validation/warnings.

TODO: 'Figure out why and fix it'. Working directory setting breaks tests but reason is unclear. Commented out with 'I'm more interested in writing tests than debugging it right now' - needs investigation.
Unwrap on critical operations: Multiple unwrap() calls that could panic (file operations, path operations, lock acquisition). Lines 203, 267, 272, 273, 276 - should use proper error handling.
Multiple unwrap() calls on tree instance lookups. Should handle missing instances gracefully instead of panicking.
Large file with 596 lines. Should be refactored into smaller, more focused modules. Consider splitting into separate files for different project concepts (config, validation, resolution).
Large file with 495 lines. Should be refactored into smaller modules focused on different resolution concerns.
Large file with 371 lines. Consider breaking into separate modules for different change handling concerns.
Test coverage appears limited. Critical paths like full server lifecycle, VFS interactions, and complex patch scenarios should have more comprehensive tests.
